title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-3.2 - Prohibitions

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 217-3.2 - Prohibitions

State Regulations

No person who owns, operates or leases a heavy duty
vehicle including a bus or truck, the motive power for which is provided by a
diesel or nondiesel fueled engine or who owns, leases or occupies land and has
the actual or apparent dominion or control over the operation of a heavy duty
vehicle including a bus or truck present on such land, the motive power for
which said heavy duty vehicle is provided by a diesel or non-diesel fueled
engine, shall allow or permit the engine of such heavy duty vehicle to idle for
more than five consecutive minutes when the heavy duty vehicle is not in
motion, except as otherwise permitted by section
217-3.3
of this

Subpart. Notes
